Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.10691702]Virus:HIV-1 (EC50= 50-275 nM).NOTE:EC50 = concentration that is 50% effective.[Ref.18008336]Virus:HIV:inhibition the cytopathic effects of HIV-1 infection in cultured human T-lymphoblast (CEM-SS) cells(EC50=50-275 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism. Inhibits the cytopathic effects of the human immunodeficiency virus.
Sequence Information.PTM: This is a cyclic peptide which may contain three disulfide bonds 4-20; 8-22; 13-27.

Literature.Title: New circulin macrocyclic polypeptides from Chassalia parvifolia.
Literature.Author: Gustafson KR, Walton LK, Sowder RC Jr, Johnson DG, Pannell LK, Cardellina JH Jr, Boyd MR.

Literature.Title: Cyclotides as natural anti-HIV agents.
Literature.Author: Ireland DC, Wang CK, Wilson JA, Gustafson KR, Craik DJ.
